Simulation module¶

Simulation.ODEstep(ydot, y0, t)[source]
__Purpose__

Get collection of values for function(s) after performing one step

__Input__

ydot [lambda]: ODE to solve, collection of derivatives y0 [float]: initial value of variables t [list of float]: [initial time, final time] where final_time=initial_time+delta_time

__Return__

list of float

Simulation.RK4step(derivative, y0, t0, dt)[source]
Simulation.formatResultsAsDictionary(t, y, names)[source]

Reformat results array from simulation as dictionary.

Parameters

  • t¶ – collection of times that simulation was run at

  • y¶ – results from simulation. Same format type as output from solveODE()

  • names¶ – name(s) of variable(s). Index corresponds to those in y

Return type

Dict[str, ndarray]

Returns

Dictionary of results from simulation. Key is name of variable as string. Value is array of floats for variable. Array is ordered such that each float corresponds to the time step at the same index. Time steps are stored at key ‘t’.

Simulation.solveODE(ydot, y0, t)[source]

Solve ODE IVP numerically

Parameters

  • ydot¶ – derivative vector

  • y0¶ – initial condition of derivative vector

  • t¶ – collection of times to solve ODE at

Return type

Tuple[ndarray, ndarray]

Returns

2D ndarray of floats. First index corresponds to time step. Second index corresponds to simulated variable.
